user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, stylish underwear that stays in place and doesn't require constant adjustment throughout the day.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that wouldn't shift or ride up, especially after discarding my old, uncomfortable pairs. Recommendations from my sisters played a significant role in my decision, as they both praised this brand for its comfort and fit. The attractive design and the promise of a no muffin top feature also appealed to me, as I wanted something that would look good and feel good throughout the day.

My primary motivation for purchasing this product was to find underwear that wouldn't ride up, which I find very uncomfortable. The recommendation from my sisters was crucial, and I also relied on the positive reviews from other customers. I opted for a size up based on feedback, which ultimately led to a perfect fit and enhanced comfort. The lightweight and stretchy material was an added bonus that met my needs for both style and comfort.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer comfortable, stylish, and easy-care clothing that fits well and enhances my mobility. I value breathable fabrics that are soft to the touch and maintain their shape and appearance after washing. I appreciate longer lengths in tops that prevent riding up during activities like yoga, and I enjoy unique patterns and colors that add a touch of personality to my wardrobe. Additionally, I prefer products that are versatile enough to be dressed up or down and that provide functional features, such as pockets in leggings. On the other hand, I dislike items with poor fit, especially those that are too long or tight in certain areas, as well as products with excessive tags that can be uncomfortable. I also find it frustrating when items do not perform as expected, such as compression socks that fail to provide noticeable benefits or bras that are uncomfortable and poorly designed. Overall, I seek a balance of comfort, style, and practicality in my purchases.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and stylish underwear that stays in place and doesn't need constant adjustment during the day. within my expected price range: [12.57, 12.96]

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless Brief> / Item ID: B075J3T6MD / Price: $7.06 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A no-ride-up design, Bali® women’s Comfort Revolution® brief is made for the woman on-the-go. Designed with Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking nylon fabric, this women’s panty will keep you comfortable all-day long. The high-rise, seamless panty features a tag-free design that won’t chafe or dig. Narrow leg bands and a knit-in waistband help minimize panty lines for a smooth finish. A classic brief cut, Bali® seamless women’s underwear offers full front and back coverage so you can move with confidence.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless Hi-Cut> / Item ID: B08YXC41MD / Price: $8.66 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A no-ride-up design, Bali® women’s Comfort Revolution® hi-cut panty is made for the woman on-the-go. Designed with Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking nylon fabric, this women’s panty will keep you comfortable all-day long. The high-cut, seamless panty features a tag-free design that won’t chafe or dig. Narrow leg bands and a knit-in waistband help minimize panty lines for a smooth finish. A classic high-rise design, Bali® seamless women’s underwear offers full front and back coverage so you can move with confidence.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Tagless White Briefs with ComfortFlex Waistband-Multiple Packs Available> / Item ID: B09J23VG1K / Price: $7.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Briefs'] / Description: ["When it's time to stock up on basic white briefs, Hanes® has the ones you want. These soft, cotton-blend men's briefs are knit from Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. You'll really appreciate the ComfortFlex® waistband that moves with you and keeps its shape wash after wash without pinching or binding. These ultra comfortable, full-cut, cotton-blend briefs are also tagless so there's no annoying tag to bunch up or itch. With a traditional open fly, this cool, breathable underwear comes in a convenient 6-pack of all white so stocking up is a no-brainer."]
